====== CSS Variable ======


===== About =====
This is an advanced CSS topic that you can use while [[:howto:theme-creation|creating your theme]].

You can set CSS variables:
  * to have a global set of CSS values
  * to customize the [[docs:theme:bootstrap|bootstrap stylesheet]]


===== Bootstrap CSS Variables =====

Bootstrap allows customizing its stylesheet via [[https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.1/customize/css-variables/|css variables]].

Combostap uses them to apply the [[:docs:app:color|branding colors]].

If you want to customize or add your own, they are in the [[howto:theme-creation#what_are_partials|partial]] ''head-partials.hbs''.

Example:
<code handlebars>
{{#if primary-color}}
    <style>
        :root {
            --bs-primary: {{primary-color}};
        }
        .btn-primary {
            --bs-btn-bg: {{primary-color}};
            --bs-btn-border-color: {{primary-color}};
        }
    </style>
{{/if}}
</code>
